# Author: petter.strandmark@gmail.com (Petter Strandmark)

ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(gecode)
set_target_properties(gecodefloat PROPERTIES EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 1 EXCLUDE_FROM_DEFAULT_BUILD 1)
set_target_properties(fzn-gecode PROPERTIES EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 1 EXCLUDE_FROM_DEFAULT_BUILD 1)
set_target_properties(gecode-test PROPERTIES EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 1 EXCLUDE_FROM_DEFAULT_BUILD 1)
set_target_properties(gecodedriver PROPERTIES EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 1 EXCLUDE_FROM_DEFAULT_BUILD 1)
set_target_properties(gecodeflatzinc PROPERTIES EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 1 EXCLUDE_FROM_DEFAULT_BUILD 1)
set_target_properties(gecodefloat PROPERTIES EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 1 EXCLUDE_FROM_DEFAULT_BUILD 1)
set_target_properties(gecodeminimodel PROPERTIES EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 1 EXCLUDE_FROM_DEFAULT_BUILD 1)

SET_PROPERTY(TARGET gecodedriver PROPERTY FOLDER "Gecode")
SET_PROPERTY(TARGET gecodeflatzinc PROPERTY FOLDER "Gecode")
SET_PROPERTY(TARGET gecodefloat PROPERTY FOLDER "Gecode")
SET_PROPERTY(TARGET gecodeint PROPERTY FOLDER "Gecode")
SET_PROPERTY(TARGET gecodekernel PROPERTY FOLDER "Gecode")
SET_PROPERTY(TARGET gecodeminimodel PROPERTY FOLDER "Gecode")
SET_PROPERTY(TARGET gecodesearch PROPERTY FOLDER "Gecode")
SET_PROPERTY(TARGET gecodeset PROPERTY FOLDER "Gecode")
SET_PROPERTY(TARGET gecodesupport PROPERTY FOLDER "Gecode")
SET_PROPERTY(TARGET fzn-gecode PROPERTY FOLDER "Gecode")
SET_PROPERTY(TARGET gecode-test PROPERTY FOLDER "Gecode")

ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(minisat)
